definition: along/to follow (a line, tradition etc)/to carry on/to trim (a border with braid, tape etc)/border/edge

sentences.english: Pick a hat that will break up the line from the brim to the tip of your nose.
sentences.chinese: 挑一頂能你的鼻子與帽沿部分的線不那麼長的帽子。

sentences.english: Your hat strategically dipped below one eye, your scarf, it was apricot.
sentences.chinese: 繫着杏黃的圍巾，帽沿戰略地遮住一隻眼睛。

sentences.english: Roman wore a smashed down hat with a flimsy brim all the way around it.
sentences.chinese: 戴了一頂破帽子，整個一圈帽沿都快掉下來似的。

sentences.english: Curtain hat at the brim hanging wire, and decorated with beads decorated Chui.
sentences.chinese: 帷帽在帽沿垂下絲網，並飾以珠翠裝飾。

sentences.english: Your hat strconsumedgicingly dipped followed below one eye. your scarf. it was apricot.
sentences.chinese: 繫着杏黃的圍巾，帽沿戰略地遮住一隻眼睛。

sentences.english: A hat top is made into a semi-conical structure by soft materials and connected with the brim.
sentences.chinese: 帽頂用軟材料做成半圓錐形結構並與帽沿相連接。

sentences.english: The Light Siam Satin crystal cap has a matt clear crystal trim.
sentences.chinese: 淺紅色銀彩水晶帽子富有一個磨砂帽沿。

definition: cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
Chinese skullcap resembling the skin of half a watermelon
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
